answerText: R.U.R. [accept Rossum's Universal Robots] [10] This Czech author of The War With the Newts wrote R. U. R.
heading: ACF Fall |2008 | Caltech + Langston | 11 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The play ends when Alquist entrusts the future of the world to the new lovers Primus and Helena.  [10] Name this play in which Fabry, Dr. Gall, and Harry Domin are destroyed when the factory is stormed by the titular automatons.
